category.name: Maintenance.File Caching
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Dataset_Selective_File_Caching_Rule_Condition_And_Blacklist
preference.preference_description: Defines the base business rule for selective file caching at the Dataset (parent type) level. Valid values are in the format "<BMIDE Condition Name>:<List of comma separated FSC IDs or *>".
